mapper.insert: insert into weekly_record (id, content, disabled, create_time, create_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, content, disabled, create_time, create_id from weekly_record
